title: Global Illumination in C++
description: Crafted a Monte Carlo ray tracer in C++ that simulates realistic global illumination featuring transparent, reflective, and Lambertian surfaces.

title: Procedural Planet in THREE.js
description: Created a procedurally generated planet using noise to generate terrain, clouds, and stars in THREE.js. Try it here: procedural-planet.vercel.app

title: Web App for Selecting Courses
description: Developed a web app for selecting master's courses as a Bachelor's thesis. Created with React.js for UI and Google Firebase for user management and database. Explore: litheval.vercel.app

title: Animated Short in Blender
description: Produced an animated short film from scratch in Blender, where responsibilities included animation, lighting, and props. Watch the short film: youtube.com/animated-short

title: Singing Web Game in P5.js
description: Developed a singing game using the JavaScript library p5.js, designed for creative coding. Primarily managed user inputs. Explore more: itch.io/sjungande-phadderister

title: Chatbot using Machine Learning
description: Implemented a Python chatbot using TF-IDF and cosine similarity. Processes conversational datasets, extracts features, and engages in text-based conversations.

title: Curling Simulation in Unreal Engine 5
description: Investigated the movement of curling stones, employing Euler Approximation to simulate friction and the curling effect. Developed in Unreal Engine 5.

title: The Iconic Blender Guru Donut
description: Followed The Blender Guru Donut tutorial covering basics like modeling, texturing, and rendering in Blender, helping users in creating a detailed donut scene.

title: Online Multiplayer Mini Golf
description: A web-based multiplayer golf game where players can compete against each other in real-time. The game is created with React as the frontend and Google Firebase for authentication and data management. The golf game itself is built using Three.js. Check it out here: webgolf.vercel.app
